title: Connor McDavid, Boston Bruins struggling - NHL
text:
by Allan Muir Twitter Email Posted: Mon Oct. 12, 2015
Let's take a look at the week ahead, with a focus on a promising young star who is looking for his first goal and a renewal of one of the NHLâ€™s great rivalries.
